content: या {c2c} <ab>P.</ab> (याति, ययौ, अयासीत्, यास्यति, यांतुं, यात) {@--1@} To go, move, walk, proceed; ययौ तदीयामवलंब्य चांगुलिं <ls>R. 3. 25</ls>; अन्वग्ययौ मध्यमलोकपालः <ls n="R.">2. 16.</ls> {@--2@} To march against, invade; <ls>Ms. 7. 183.</ls> {@--3@} To go to, march towards, set out for (with <ab>acc.</ab>, <ab>dat.</ab> or with प्रति). {@--4@} To pass away, withdraw, depart; यातु प्रस्तुतमनुसंधीयतां <ls>H. 3.</ls> ‘let it go or pass, never mind it’. {@--5@} To vanish, disappear; यातस्तवापि च विवेकः <ls>Bv. 1. 66</ls>; भाग्यक्रमेण हि धनानि भवंति यांति <ls>Mk. 1. 13.</ls> {@--6@} To pass away or by, elapse (as time); यौवनमनिवर्ति यातं तु <ls>K. P. 10.</ls> {@--7@} To last. {@--8@} To happen, come to <ab>pass.</ab> {@--9@} To go or be reduced to any state, be or become (usually with the <ab>acc.</ab> of abstract noun). {@--10@} To undertake; न स्वस्य सिद्धौ यास्यामि सर्गव्यापार मात्मना <ls>Ku. 2. 54.</ls> {@--11@} To have carnal intercourse with. {@--12@} To request, implore. {@--13@} To find out, discover. {@--14@} To behave, act. (The meanings of या, like those of गम्, are variously modified according to the noun with which it is connected; {%<ab>e. g.</ab>%} नाशं या to be destroyed; वाच्यतां या to incur blame or censure; लघुतां या to be slighted; प्रकृतिं या to regain one's natural state; निद्रां या to fall asleep; वशं या to submit, go into one's possession; उदयं या to rise; अस्तं या to set, decline; पारं या to reach the other side of, to master, surmount, get over; पदं या to attain to the position of; अग्रे या to go before, take the lead, lead; अधो या to sink; विपर्यासं या to undergo a change, to be changed in appearance; शिरसा महीं या to bend the head down to the ground &c.), {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} (यापयति-ते) {@--1@} To cause to go or proceed. {@--2@} To remove, drive away; प्रमदया मदयापितलज्जया <ls>R. 9. 31.</ls> {@--3@} To spend, pass (time): तांवत्कोकिल विरसान्ं यापय दिवसान् <ls>Bv. 1. 7</ls>; <ls>Me. 89.</ls> {@--4@} To live or spend time with; <ls>Ki. 2. 45.</ls> {@--5@} To support, nourish. {%--<ab>Desid.</ab>%} (यियासति) To wish to go, to be about to go &c. --WITH अति {1} to go beyond, transgress, violate. {2} to surpass. --अधि to go away or forth; escape; कुतोऽधियास्यसि कूर निहतस्तेन पात्रिभिः <ls>Bk. 8. 90.</ls>
